text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar #1stamendment is still part of the #Constitution, right. How about you #protect it and do your job. I guess the #oath you took means nothing to you. Stop worrying about the #press and worry about #COVID19 #LeadershipMatters #FactsNotFear #FactsMatter #distractiontactics #70days
